title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 940.4 - Public Service Announcements Excluded as Gifts Under Parts 933 and 934
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 940.4 - Public Service Announcements Excluded as Gifts Under Parts 933 and 934

State Regulations

Notwithstanding any provision of Public Officers Law section
73(5), Legislative Law article 1-A, part 933, and part 934, paying for the
production or publishing of a public service announcement does not constitute a
gift
as that term is defined or otherwise used in Public

Officers Law section 73(5), Legislative Law article 1-A, part 933, and part
934. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 19
ยง
940.4

Adopted, New

York State Register, Volume XXXVI, Issue 32, effective
8/13/2014

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
